code: import React from'react';import{useSelector,useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{deleteContact}from'../redux/contacts-operations';import'./Contacts.css';import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Contacts=function Contacts(){var contacts=useSelector(function(state){return state.contacts.items;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var filter=useSelector(function(state){return state.contacts.filter;});var toLowerCase=filter.toLowerCase();var showContacts=contacts.filter(function(contact){return contact.name.toLowerCase().includes(toLowerCase);});var onDeleteContact=function onDeleteContact(contactId){dispatch(deleteContact(contactId));};return contacts&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{children:showContacts.map(function(_ref){var id=_ref.id,name=_ref.name,number=_ref.number;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"contacts__item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"contacts__text",children:[name,": ",number]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:function onClick(){return onDeleteContact(id);},children:"delete"})]},id);})});};export default Contacts;
